mapper.sql: a.mediate_record AS "mediateRecord", a.relation_id AS "relationId", a.time AS "time", a.content AS "content", a.result AS "result", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN MEDIATE_EVIDENCE b ON b.mediate_evidence_id = a.relation_id
LEFT JOIN REACH_MEDIATE b ON b.reach_mediate_id = a.relation_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEDIATE_RECORD( mediate_record, relation_id, time, content, result, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{mediateRecord}, #{relationId}, #{time}, #{content}, #{result}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
